price: Akazotorana ubutumwa bwanje n’ubutumwa bwa Bene Yakubu; kandi ndagusavye Mana yanje Rurema Allah, Uzomugire umwana Ushimishwa n’ivyo akora, agashimwa n’abantu”.
arabic: يَرِثُنِي وَيَرِثُ مِنۡ ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَۖ وَٱجۡعَلۡهُ رَبِّ رَضِيّٗا

meta.transliteration: yarithunī wayarithu min āli yaʿqūba wa-ij'ʿalhu rabbi raḍiyyan
